AGENDA: Our day of learning and networking includes a single track of eight 20 minute sessions and four Q&A panels: ![Agenda](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sciensio/Kristitest/master/img/SEJAgenda.jpg)
SPEAKERS: We are pleased to have the following industry experts as speakers: %[Speakers](https://www.searchenginejournal.com/sejsummit2016/chicago/speakers/)
NETWORKING: The day includes over three hours of high-quality networking opportunities: ![Networking](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sciensio/Kristitest/master/img/SEJNetworking.jpg)
GETTING THERE: The following information will assist you in getting to the Summit: %[Location](postback:LOCATION) %[Driving Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/ULPGpfUHpXQ2) %[Parking](postback:PARKING)
LOCATION: The Summit is being held in Festival Hall at the Navy Pier on 600 E Grand Ave in Chicago, IL 60611. ![Navy_Pier](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sciensio/Kristitest/master/img/navypierimage.jpg)
